name: YOU ARE LOST IN SPACE
description:
GO COMPLETELY FULLSCREEN TO PLAY THE GAME NORMAL

CONTROLS: W/A/S/D

Push the blocks and pull the levers.

2053 year. Space research station Exodus - 13. 8 hours have passed since the collision with the meteorite. Surviving crew members - 1. The station is de-energized. The oxygen is running out. Astronaut Matthew Cohen wakes up after being unconscious. Саn he arrive on time to the rescue shuttle ?

Created by:

developer/Programmer - Ernst Studio

game designer - ShriGanapati

sound designer - Mathbard

2d artist - Sirenightsparrow
